summary: The diff adds a new LoveTheLiquidPage with an H1 title, an embedded Ko-fi iframe, and a CTA button linking to Ko-fi. It also adds a lazy-loaded TanStack Router route at /love-the-liquid and adds navigation links in both the desktop header and the mobile menu (with menu close on click).

hallucinated_features.description: Added additional monetization-page content beyond the requested title/embed/button (e.g., 'Why Support?' section and extra descriptive/support text).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4/5 only request a prominent title, an embedded Ko-fi view, and a CTA button link; the extra sections/content are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added decorative icons and styling elements (Heart/ExternalLink icons, gradient card header) not specified in the request.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for icons or specific visual embellishments; only functional UI elements are required.
